trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um local de qualificado de atividade que corresponde a um evento de status de atividade no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Sempre que altera o status de execução de uma atividade, a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de status de atividade para a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can send the tracking service an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> whenever an activity status event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução pode enviar o serviço de controle de um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>sempre que ocorre um evento de status de atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Usually, a tracking service is not interested in every activity status event that occurs in the workflow instance, but only in activity status events associated with certain kinds of activities at specified locations in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um serviço de controle não está interessado em todos os eventos de status de atividade que ocorre na instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas apenas em eventos de status de atividade associado a determinados tipos de atividades em locais especificados na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An ActivityTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying a reference activity type, a set of activity status change events, and a set of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Um ActivityTrackingLocation define os parâmetros correspondentes para tal um local, especificando um tipo de atividade de referência, um conjunto de status da atividade de alteração eventos e um conjunto de condições que mais precisamente pode qualificar uma instância ou instâncias do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A single ActivityTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um único ActivityTrackingLocation pode se referir a mais de um local real no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You add ActivityTrackingLocation objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> in order to define the match parameters for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Você adiciona objetos ActivityTrackingLocation <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>para definir os parâmetros de correspondência para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the reference activity type to be matched by setting either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o tipo de atividade de referência a ser correspondido, definindo um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> to specify interest in activities derived from the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>para especificar o interesse em atividades derivado do tipo de atividade de referência.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> to specify the activity status events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>valores <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>para especificar os eventos de status de atividade a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to specify interest in the reference activity type only for specific conditions.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>para especificar o interesse no tipo de atividade de referência somente para condições específicas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify interest in only a particular named instance of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode especificar interesse em apenas uma instância nomeada específica do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor and you do not explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code, then if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> is later used on your tracking profile an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar o construtor padrão e você não definir explicitamente um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>em seu código, se, em seguida, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>será usado posteriormente no seu perfil de rastreamento, uma exceção será lançada.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the specified activity name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o nome da atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividade é "CodeActivity".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> is set to `activityTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>é definido como `activityTypeName`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| O nome não qualificado especificado pelo `activityTypeName` do tipo de atividade de referência. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) de uma atividade.

trans-unit.source: activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityTypeNameé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the specified reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe usando o tipo de atividade de referência especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> is set to `activityType`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>é definido como `activityType`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| O tipo de atividade de referência especificado pelo `activityType`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>de uma atividade.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityTypeé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe que tem uma atividade de referência de tipo com o nome desqualificado especificado e que corresponde os eventos de status de execução de atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividade é "CodeActivity".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `ExecutionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| O nome não qualificado especificado pelo `activityTypeName` do tipo de atividade de referência. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>que contém os valores de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>especificados por `ExecutionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) de uma atividade.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém um ou mais do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: activityTypeNameé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic) - ou - executionStatusEvents é uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has the specified reference activity type and matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe que tem o tipo de atividade de referência especificada e corresponde os eventos de status de execução de atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| O tipo de atividade de referência especificado pelo `activityType`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>que contém os valores de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>especificados por `executionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>de uma atividade.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém um ou mais do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityTypeé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: - ou - executionStatusEvents é uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe que tem o tipo com o nome especificado não qualificado, que especifica se deve ser derivadas do tipo de atividade de referência de atividades de corresponder e que coincide com os eventos de status de execução de atividade especificada de uma atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is"CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividade é "CodeActivity".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| O nome não qualificado especificado pelo `activityTypeName` do tipo de atividade de referência. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>que contém os valores de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>especificados por `executionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `matchDerivedTypes`. |</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo common language runtime (CLR) de uma atividade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se atividades derivam do tipo de atividade de referência deve ser correspondentes; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém um ou mais do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: activityTypeNameé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic) - ou - executionStatusEvents é uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has the specified reference activity type, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe que tem o tipo de atividade de referência especificada, que especifica se deve ser derivadas do tipo de atividade de referência de atividades de corresponder e que coincide com os eventos de status de execução de atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| O tipo de atividade de referência especificado pelo `activityType`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>que contém os valores de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>especificados por `executionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `matchDerivedTypes`. |</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>de uma atividade.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se atividades derivam do tipo de atividade de referência deve ser correspondentes; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém um ou mais do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityTypeé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: - ou - executionStatusEvents é uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the reference activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo common language runtime (CLR) da atividade de referência a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or ActivityType for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar um a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>ou ActivityType para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the reference activity type in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser especificar o tipo de atividade de referência de maneira independente de versão, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>da atividade.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the reference activity type for the location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência para o local.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity set ActivityTypeName to "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para especificar o nome não qualificado de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>ActivityTypeName para "CodeActivity" conjunto de atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify a reference activity type when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName fornece uma maneira muito mais fácil de especificar um tipo de atividade de referência quando você cria um perfil diretamente no XML.

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to a reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName também fornece uma maneira independente de versão de se referir a um tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either the ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o ActivityTypeName ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de condições que são usados para qualificar interesse na atividade.

trans-unit.source: You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the reference activity type to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar condições para definir com mais precisão a instância do tipo de atividade de referência a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to"CodeActivity" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você deseja corresponder somente <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividades com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>igual a "MyCode", você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>para "CodeActivity" e adicione uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>às condições que especifica que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de instância de atividade deve ser igual a "MyCode".</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be `true` and one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> must be matched for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>condições deve ser `true` e uma da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>valores em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>devem ser correspondentes para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that contains conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"> </xref> que contém condições que são usadas para qualificar interesse na atividade.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de atividade de eventos de status que podem ser adequados para esse local.

trans-unit.source: ExecutionStatusEvents specifies the activity status events for which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> can be matched.
trans-unit.target: ExecutionStatusEvents Especifica os eventos de status de atividade para o qual o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>pode ser correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in ExecutionStatusEvents must be matched and every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>valores em ExecutionStatusEvents devem ser correspondentes e cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>deve ser `true` para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>a ser correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>

trans-unit.source: An empty list specifies that no events are to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista vazia não especifica que nenhum evento a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> que contém um ou mais do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as atividades derivadas do tipo de atividade de referência devem ser correspondidas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type of the location should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se atividades derivam do tipo de atividade de referência do local deve ser correspondido; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
